item.description: Rosebud Bar and Grill is closing  at the end of the month, the diner and bar have been sold and RosebudKaraoke will have a new home. Join us May 19th at the Legendary Johnny D's Lounge for what will be a great night and a great start of continuing a great karaoke night in the Davis Sq area. For the first few months it will rotate around Sunday and Tuesday nights until there entertainment schedule frees up a bit for a permanent Tuesday slot. So please join us for our inaugural launch on Sunday May 19th at 8pm. Can't wait, great spot, stage, lighting, great food and bar. See you there.
item.name: New spot in Somerville for Karaoke
